name: Bacteria Aussault
description:
A game made for the #27 Curdle Jam.

Merge bacteria to overcome the cells protector and match the right color and right amount of merged bacteria to destroy the cell. Be wise about merging and using different Abilities.

How to play

Your main goal is to combine your bacteria army and overcome the central cell. 

1) Try to get the highest multiplier possible and the matching color to attack a cell.

2) Target the top and bottom cells to get currency to buy power-ups in the shop.

3) Cell defenders will weaken your attack. Use the power-ups against them.

Developed by:

@epaezrubio

@decain

@sqeakkk

The source code is available on GitHub
